name: Rank
description: The static rank roughly reflects the log probability of an entity being 'important' - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/academic-services/graph/resources-faq#what-is-the-rank-value-on-entities

name: Doi
description: Doi values are upper-cased per DOI standard

name: DocType
description: Book, BookChapter, Conference, Dataset, Journal, Patent, Repository, Thesis, NULL : unknown

name: OriginalTitle
description: The Original Title of the Paper

name: ReferenceCount
description: The number of Papers this Paper references

name: CitationCount
description: The number of Papers that cite this Paper

name: EstimatedCitation
description: An estimation of objects citing this paper beyond what MAG has in it's database

name: FamilyId
description: A paper 'family' is defined as a group of papers that have been determined to be the same fundamental paper, but published in different venues - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/academic-services/graph/resources-faq#what-is-familyid-in-papers

name: CreatedDate
description: The date in which this record was first created
